section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO.
explanation: The section is structurally flawed because it only states the name of the business without providing the context of what the business is or what it does. This means that the text does not make sense on its own and needs additional information to be understood.

section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service.
explanation: The text is ambiguous because it lacks clarity with the overall sentance structure. The sentance structure and the words selected do not convey a clear purpose for the venture.

section: JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD To be paid within 90 days of signing this agreement. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The text is ambiguous because it is unclear if the 10% of gross revenue is also due within 90 days, or if it is due at a later date. The deadline of 90 days is not clearly applied to the 10% gross revenue.

section: Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD in cash. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The text is misaligned because both the BorrowMoney.com, inc and the JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go contributions are valued at $3,500,000.00 USD, but the JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go contribution is listed as $60,000.00 USD in cash plus 10% of any generated gross revenue. This causes the contributions to not align. There is no clear and consistent value to each contribution.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined based on the total revenue generated over the last 3 months. An appraiser will be appointed within a reasonable period of the date of withdrawal or dissolution. The results of the appraisal will be binding on all Members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be based on the proportion of their respective capital account less any outstanding liabilities a Member may have to the Venture. The intent of this section is to ensure the survival of the Venture despite the withdrawal of any individual Member.
explanation: The text is structurally flawed because the value of the venture is based on revenue generated, while a withdrawing member's interest is based on the proportion of their capital account. This does not make sense because the value of the venture should be in line with a withdrawing member's interest.

section: Force majeure will include, but not be limited to, earthquake, typhoon, flood, fire, and war or any other unforeseen and uncontrollable event.
explanation: The text is ambiguous because the phrase "any other unforeseen and uncontrollable event" is vague. This makes it unclear which events qualify as force majeure and could lead to legal disputes over what constitutes an excusable event.
